name: Double runner (Idla games)
description:
• PC, Tablet, and Mobile
  • Optimized code ( Good performance in old devices )
  • Keyboard, Mouse and Touch
  • Easy to add / replace images
  • Export this game to IOS and ANDROID
  • Add ADS, like AdMob, to monetize
  • Plugins & Behaviors included
  • ogg & m4a audio files included
  • 2 levels
  • Orientations: Landscape
  • Resolution: 854×480
  • Aspect ratio: 16:9

Evade obstacles, collect coins, reach the end. 2 levels, desert and snow. 2 players in the same device.

Keyboard
Player 1 Jump = "W"
Player 2 Jump = "UP ARROW"

Touch
Player 1 Jump = Touch left side in the screen
Player 2 Jump = Touch right side in the screen
